analysis.description: usingOraclize.getCodeSize (/unique_chucks/10/0x357f07ac89ee6329a70ca837d6bfc16b0275015f.sol#580-582) is declared view but contains assembly code
usingOraclize.copyBytes (/unique_chucks/10/0x357f07ac89ee6329a70ca837d6bfc16b0275015f.sol#986-1003) is declared view but contains assembly code

EthereumSweepstakes.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/10/0x357f07ac89ee6329a70ca837d6bfc16b0275015f.sol#1245-1290) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- sweepsToken.transfer(msg.sender,tokensBought) == false

Reentrancy in EthereumSweepstakes.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/10/0x357f07ac89ee6329a70ca837d6bfc16b0275015f.sol#1245-1290):
	External calls:
	- tokensRemaining = sweepsToken.balanceOf(this) (/unique_chucks/10/0x357f07ac89ee6329a70ca837d6bfc16b0275015f.sol#1262-1263)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- numTokensSold (/unique_chucks/10/0x357f07ac89ee6329a70ca837d6bfc16b0275015f.sol#1275)

Reentrancy in usingOraclize.oraclizeAPI (/unique_chucks/10/0x357f07ac89ee6329a70ca837d6bfc16b0275015f.sol#108-120):
	External calls:

	- oraclize = OraclizeI(OAR.getAddress()) (/unique_chucks/10/0x357f07ac89ee6329a70ca837d6bfc16b0275015f.sol#116-120)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- oraclize (/unique_chucks/10/0x357f07ac89ee6329a70ca837d6bfc16b0275015f.sol#116-120)
